mapper.select: select m.member_no, m.id, m.name, m.nickname, m.level, s.business_name, s.business_address, s.business_tel, s.openingTime, s.closingTime, m.registeredDate from member m join seller s on m.member_no = s.member_no order by m.member_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, authority, name, nickname, email, birthday, photo, phoneNumber) values(#{id}, password(#{password}), #{authority},#{name},#{nickname},#{email},#{birthday},#{photo},#{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: select s.member_no, m.name, m.id, m.nickname, m.level, m.email, m.birthday, m.photo, m.phoneNumber, s.business_name, s.business_no, s.business_address, s.business_tel, s.openingTime, s.closingTime, m.registeredDate, m.authority from member m join seller s on m.member_no=s.member_no where m.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set nickname=#{nickname}, email=#{email}, password=password(#{password}), photo=#{photo}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} where member_no=#{number}

update seller set business_name=#{businessName}, business_no=#{businessNumber}, business_address=#{businessAddress}, business_tel=#{businessPlaceNumber}, openingTime=#{businessOpeningTime}, closingTime=#{businessClosingTime} where member_no=#{member.number}
mapper.delete: update member set name="none", nickname="none", birthday="0000-00-00", password="none", photo="none", phoneNumber="none", zipcode=0, address="none", detail_address="none", active=1 where member_no=#{no}
update seller set business_name="none", business_address="none", business_tel="none", openingTime="00:00", closingTime="00:00" where member_no=#{no}
